div.p: This query provides a view of all matches data in the SanteMPI system

definitions.add:
npgsql FirebirdSQL
with possible_ignored as ( select candidate_rel.efft_vrsn_seq_id, candidate_rel.ent_rel_id , candidate_rel.src_ent_id as local_a, master_rel.src_ent_id as local_b, candidate_rel.conf as confidence, class_cd.mnemonic as class_code, rel_cd.mnemonic as rel_type, ent_vrsn_tbl.crt_utc from -- SOURCE TO MASTER CANDIDATE ent_rel_tbl as candidate_rel -- MASTER BACK TO SOURCE FOR LOCAL OF TARGET inner join ent_rel_tbl as master_rel on (candidate_rel.trg_ent_id = master_rel.trg_ent_id and master_rel.rel_typ_cd_id = '97730a52-7e30-4dcd-94cd-fd532d111578' and master_rel.obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null) inner join cd_vrsn_tbl class_cd on (class_cd.cd_id = candidate_rel.cls_cd_id and class_cd.obslt_utc is null) inner join cd_vrsn_tbl rel_cd on (rel_cd.cd_id = candidate_rel.rel_typ_cd_id and rel_cd.obslt_utc is null) inner join ent_vrsn_tbl on (candidate_rel.efft_vrsn_seq_id = ent_vrsn_tbl.vrsn_seq_id) where candidate_rel.rel_typ_cd_id in ('56cfb115-8207-4f89-b52e-d20dbad8f8cc','decfb115-8207-4f89-b52e-d20dbad8f8cc') -- filter for candidates and candidate_rel.obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null ), multi_master as ( select distinct master_a.efft_vrsn_seq_id, master_a.ent_rel_id , master_a.src_ent_id as local_a, master_b.src_ent_id as local_b, case when master_a.conf > master_b.conf then master_a.conf else master_b.conf end as confidence, case when master_a_cls.mnemonic = master_b_cls.mnemonic then master_b_cls.mnemonic else master_a_cls.mnemonic end as class_code, 'MDM-Master' as rel_type , ent_vrsn_tbl.crt_utc from ent_rel_tbl master_a inner join ent_rel_tbl master_b on (master_a.trg_ent_id = master_b.trg_ent_id and master_b.rel_typ_cd_id = '97730a52-7e30-4dcd-94cd-fd532d111578' and master_a.src_ent_id <> master_b.src_ent_id) inner join cd_vrsn_tbl master_a_cls on (master_a_cls.cd_id = master_a.cls_cd_id and master_a_cls.obslt_utc is null) inner join cd_vrsn_tbl master_b_cls on (master_b_cls.cd_id = master_b.cls_cd_id and master_b_cls.obslt_utc is null) inner join ent_vrsn_tbl on (master_a.efft_vrsn_seq_id = ent_vrsn_tbl.vrsn_seq_id) where master_a.rel_typ_cd_id = '97730a52-7e30-4dcd-94cd-fd532d111578' and master_a.obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null and master_b.obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null ) select * from ( select efft_vrsn_seq_id, ent_rel_id, local_a, local_b, confidence, class_code, rel_type, crt_utc from possible_ignored union select efft_vrsn_seq_id, ent_rel_id, local_a, local_b, confidence, class_code, rel_type, crt_utc from multi_master ) AS I order by efft_vrsn_seq_id desc
